New people technology creates new growth

This is a pivotal moment for retail. Now, more than ever, you need to plan for the future and double down on hard won growth. The idea of changing mission-critical people systems might seem like a distraction right now. But CoreHR is the right tool at the right time.

We have designed our product to be far more than a people platform - this engine of growth will be the new cornerstone of your retail strategy. It will deliver maximized output, empower your people and also provide impressive value.

Make every second count.  
CoreHR delivers:

Productivity Surge:

Our predictive systems will give every leader in your company, from store managers to the CEO, the time and information they need to run at maximum output. The effect? Key productivity stats will rise - driving sales and cutting costs.

Reduced Churn:

CoreHR’s mobile friendly platform will engage and empower your staff from shop floor to distribution centr e. A new enthusiasm will not only encourage your staff to stay, it will help them perform better than ever.

Fast upgrade:

Cost pressures and disruption are impacting daily - every second, every pound saved is vital. We can roll out your transformational systems upgrade in less than half the time and cost of our competitors.

Seize the moment  and start cutting costs

After a challenging Xmas period and with Brexit looming, growth must be protected. CoreHR generates business wide insights, helping retailers see waste and run more efficiently. With a wider view of the business you can be confident money will be saved.

Gain actionable insights from data

  • You need to divert funds to key areas like your omnichannel offer
  • Efficiencies must be found to remain competitive with online competition
  • CoreHR ‘One View’ reporting will discover new efficiencies yet to be made, saving money straight away

Boost productivity  and cut churn

CoreHR automates core Workforce Management tasks, massively cutting manager workload and time spent on jobs like rostering. Time can be redeployed to crucial business imperatives like in store customer experience and your digital offer.

CoreHR has consumer grade, mobile UX that your people will love working and interacting with – raising the bar on your employee engagement.

Empower your staff with digital brilliance

  • To grow, retail needs to boost revenue quickly and reduce staff churn 
  • CoreHR’s unique smart rostering solution will save each store manager up to 10 hours per week
  • CoreHR delivers the mobile first experience staff expect, retaining talent and cutting churn and costs in recruitment across the business
